1370: Guido was born in Muurhuysen1 in 1370.
Got married to Heylewigis at age 25 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Heylewigis, Heile, at age 25.
1371: Had a daughter with Heylewigis, Ermegardis, at age 26.
1375: Lost daughter Ermegardis when Ermegardis was 5 years old.
1376: Had a son with Heylewigis, Isbrandus, at age 31.
1377: Had a son with Heylewigis, Gelmarus, at age 32.
1378: Had a son with Heylewigis, Duker, at age 33.
1380: Had a son with Heylewigis, Bernero, at age 35.
1383: Lost son Duker when Duker was 6 years old.
